title: Gorgeous Decorative Ceramic Vase or Urn
description:
Beautiful pottery lidded ceramic vase. The lower section of the vase features a black and white base with wave and cloud motifs, as well as a boat or ship design, possibly representing a mythical vessel or journey. The lid is adorned with a sculpture of a winged or feathered figure, likely a mythical creature in black and gold. The piece is signed on the bottom. This gorgeous piece measures 17.5" tall with the lid, 9.5" tall without the lid. It is approximately 8" wide at the widest part and 4" wide at the bottom. It is signed on the bottom.

Local pick up only

100% of proceeds benefit charity. Items for sale have been donated to support our 501(c)3 organization. We receive NO government funding. title: Vintage Ron SCHRODER Sculpture of Reclining Native AMERICAN WOMAN.
description:
Beautiful terra cotta color sculpture of a Native American woman. Intricate details, she is wearing a heavily textured garment underneath a tribal robe. On her feet she wears heavy boots. Her hands are lifelike, with knuckles and fingernails.

The expression on her face is calm and gentle.

The artist surely captured a lovely young woman in repose, supported by her elbows and perhaps looking up at the stars.

She is approx 16” long, 10” wide and 7.5” tall

Please note on photo damage to the back of her head, right side

She is VERY heavy

100% of proceeds benefit Veterans charity

description:

The dove holds a peace piece branch that has inset green stone leaves. This is great for a catchall for keys as well as a serving piece. This dish or tray is fully marked "Los Castillo Taxco, Plateado and Hecho en Mexico" (translating to plated and made in Mexico) Stamped Los Castillo 331 - a Mexican metalwork studio whose works have been prized by collectors for decades.

title: Venetian Rococo Ralph Lauren Mahogany Commode and Mirror - Absolutely Fabulous!
description:
Both these items are out of production.

Ralph Lauren Home Mahogany set including a Commode 46”W x 22"D x 33.75H" and Mirror, 34.5"W x 67.5” H x 1.5"D . Both are in excellent condition! The chest is a mahogany commode in the French Rococo style. There is a serpentine top over a bombe form case that is fitted with three drawers. The top has a brushing slide. title: Colonial Sugarcane or Straw Cutter ~ Museum Quality ~ Large and Heavy
description:
This antique sugarcane cutter is a true masterpiece of colonial craftsmanship. Made of wood and iron, it is 54” long and probably around 100 pounds. It has been beautifully preserved over the years. Its exact age is unknown, but it is a genuine original piece probably from the Caribbean. I’m not an expert, but I’ve been told it probably dates back to the colonial era.

The sugarcane cutter is a highly collectible item that will add a touch of history and charm to any collection. Its intricate design and solid construction make it a museum-quality piece that is sure to impress. Whether you are a seasoned collector or just starting out, this sugarcane cutter is a must-have for any serious collector of antique decorative items.

Very cool and large. 54 inches long. The widest part is about 15 inches the beam is about 7.25 inches. Weighs about 100 pounds.

We have a 25% off storewide sale going on right now so the price of this is $1,650, no tax if you pick it up in Arizona.

title: Moroccan Style Handmade Jewellery Box in Thuya wood burl with Lock and Tray
description:
Moroccan Style Handmade Jewellery Box with 3 Section Tray in Araar, French Polished

Beautiful handmade jewellery box made of solid Thuya wood burl. Araar is a type of cedar that only grows in Morocco and has a wonderful fragrance when the jewellery box is opened. The box is made of solid wood. It is finished with french polish. Inside the jewellery box there is a tray with three sections. It also locks with a small key.

Araar only grows in Morocco, in the Atlas Mountains, and the wood from the trunk is used but also the beautiful patterns come from the root of the tree as you can see on the top of the item. Your box may differ from the pattern shown.

title: Moroccan Thuya Burl Wood Keepsake Box with Mother of Pearl Inlay
description:
Searching for a Beautiful Wedding Memory Box ? have a family or friends spacial event coming up ? You just found the right gift for that .

TAMAZART STUDIO brings you its stunning Moroccan thuya wood box, handcrafted with love by our skilled Moroccan artisans, a perfect way to store your jewelry or valuable belongings.

We ensure that our artisans use the highest quality thuya burl, and that the thuya wood is perfectly dry so that the box will not deform over time.

title: Hand‑Painted Moroccan Coffee Table, Solid Wood, Floral Berber Pattern, Custom Size , CUSTOM COFFEE TABLE, Unique low dining table
description:
HAND‑PAINTED MOROCCAN COFFEE TABLE (SOLID WOOD) — MADE IN MARRAKECH

Bring authentic Moroccan craftsmanship into your home with this hand‑painted coffee table, handmade in our Marrakech workshop from solid wood. 
 The tabletop is hand‑painted with bold color and floral/Berber inspiration, creating a functional piece of furniture that also works as art.

THE TECHNIQUE (TAZWAKT)

We use a traditional Moroccan hand‑painting technique called TAZWAKT, where carved wood is carefully painted with vibrant colors — a decorative art found on Moroccan architecture and artisan furniture. 
Because each piece is painted by hand, small variations in wood grain and color are normal and part of the handmade character.

description:

360° Rotating | 5-Position Recline | Cozy & Modern Comfort

Designed for everyday relaxation, this adjustable swivel lounge chair blends plush comfort with practical features. Whether you’re gaming, reading, watching TV, or simply unwinding, this chair adapts to your body and your space with ease.

❓ FAQ – Everything You Need to Know
Q: What makes this lounge chair different from standard floor chairs or recliners?
A: Unlike basic floor chairs, this chair features a raised, cushioned seat with a full metal frame, a spring-supported seat bag, and a 360-degree swivel base, offering superior comfort, durability, and mobility.

Q: Is this chair suitable for long sitting sessions (gaming, reading, working)?
A: Yes. The ergonomic backrest, cotton-filled cushioning, and spine-aligned recline angles are designed to reduce pressure and fatigue during extended use.

Q: How many reclining positions does the chair have?
A: The backrest adjusts to 5 distinct ergonomic angles, allowing you to sit upright, lean back, lounge, or rest comfortably without strain.

Q: Does the chair rotate smoothly on all floor types?
A: The 360-degree swivel base rotates smoothly and quietly on most indoor surfaces. For delicate flooring, a protective mat is recommended.

Q: Is the fabric breathable and easy to maintain?
A: Yes. The upholstery is made from soft, breathable fabric that resists overheating. Spot cleaning with a damp cloth is recommended for everyday care.

Q: What is the built-in phone holder used for?
A: The integrated phone holder allows for hands-free viewing, making it ideal for watching videos, gaming guides, video calls, or scrolling while relaxing.

Q: Is this chair safe for apartments, dorms, and small spaces?
A: Absolutely. The chair has a compact footprint, arrives in folded packaging, and is easy to assemble—perfect for apartments, dorm rooms, and cozy living areas.

Q: How sturdy is the chair? Will it wobble when swiveling?
A: The chair is supported by a reinforced metal frame and balanced swivel base, providing stable rotation without wobbling during normal use.

Q: Is the chair eco-friendly or low-emission?
A: The chair is made using low-emission materials, helping maintain healthier indoor air quality while delivering long-lasting comfort.

Q: Who is this chair best for?
A: Ideal for adults, teens, gamers, readers, remote workers, and anyone looking for a comfortable leisure chair for everyday relaxation.

Q: Do I need a box spring?
A: No. Wood slats are included and designed to support your mattress directly.
A: And bed to work with box spring or adjustable bed is also availible, select as per your request.

Q: Will it work with an adjustable base?
A: Yes—many customers use it with an adjustable base successfully. For best fit, compare your adjustable base’s outer dimensions to the bed’s inner clearance (message us your base model if you want help confirming).

Q: Will ivory match my bedroom furniture and decor?
A: Yes. Ivory is a versatile neutral that pairs beautifully with light oak, walnut, black accents, brass, modern, coastal, and minimalist styles.

Q: What is the weight capacity?
A: The metal frame is engineered to support up to 1000 lbs evenly distributed.

Q: Is it sturdy—will it wobble?
A: When assembled correctly, customers said it as sturdy as a stone. We recommend tightening all hardware after assembly and re-tightening after a few nights of use.

Q: Is this bed pet-friendly?
A: Yes. The grounded base means no under-bed space, so no lost toys or dust piles. The boucle fabric is soft yet durable for everyday living.

A: This bed frame works well with minimalist, Scandinavian, modern, rustic-modern, classic-Modern , Clean & Elevated and neutral bedroom decor.

Full/Queen/ King/California King/use with box spring or adjustble bed in Queen, King size

Q: Is assembly difficult?
A: Customers describe it as straightforward. Two people are recommended

Q: Is the package heavy? Do I need help moving it?
A: Yes—boxes can be heavy, and many buyers recommend two people to move the cartons safely.

Q: What is GREENGUARD Gold certified fabric? Is it really safer?
A: Yes. The boucle fabric we use is GREENGUARD Gold certified, which means it has been independently tested and screened for over 15,000 chemicals and VOCs. This low-emitting certification helps keep your indoor air cleaner and is especially good for bedrooms, kids and pets.

Q: How does GREENGUARD Gold certification compare to big furniture brands?
GREENGUARD Gold is the same independent certification program used by well-known furniture brand such as Pottery Barn, but we are not affiliated with them. We simply choose the same strict standard to ensure low emissions and cleaner indoor air.

A cozy, minimalist bed that’s sturdy, stylish, and made with certified, eco / safe / pet & kid friendly low-emission materials.

❓ FAQ – Common questions 
Q: Do I need a box spring?
A: No. Wood slats are included and designed to support your mattress directly.

Q: What is the weight capacity?
A: The metal frame is engineered to support up to 1000 lbs evenly distributed.

Q: Is this bed pet-friendly?
A: Yes. The grounded base means no under-bed space, so no lost toys or dust piles. The boucle fabric is soft yet durable for everyday living.

Q: What style does this bed work with?
A: This cream boucle bed frame works well with minimalist, Scandinavian, modern, rustic-modern and neutral bedroom decor.

Q: Can I see the color in my own room first?
A: Yes, you can order a free fabric swatch from our swatch listing before committing to a full bed frame.
https://www.etsy.com/listing/4392861645/cream-white-boucle-fabric-swatch-for?ref=listings_manager_grid

Q: What sizes are availible?
Full, Queen, King, California King

Q: What is GREENGUARD Gold certified fabric? Is it really safer?
A: Yes. The boucle fabric we use is GREENGUARD Gold certified, which means it has been independently tested and screened for over 15,000 chemicals and VOCs. This low-emitting certification helps keep your indoor air cleaner and is especially good for bedrooms, kids and pets.

Q: How does GREENGUARD Gold certification compare to big furniture brands?
GREENGUARD Gold is the same independent certification program used by well-known furniture brand such as Pottery Barn, but we are not affiliated with them. We simply choose the same strict standard to ensure low emissions and cleaner indoor air.
